'''Wizards of the Coast LLC''' is a gaming company, founded in [[1990]]. While they initially produced role-playing games, they rose to fame when they published [[Magic: The Gathering]] in [[1993]]. Magic was a collectible trading card game (the first of its kind) with a fantasy setting containing many aesthetic elements inspired by Lord of the Rings among other fiction. Since [[1997]] they also publish [[Dungeons and Dragons]] and for several periods they also published its official periodical [[Dragon Magazine]].

In 1999 the company was acquired by Hasbro.

On June 23, 2023, Wizards released [[The Lord of the Rings: Tales of Middle-earth]] a new Magic: The Gathering set with 451 cards that were new renditions of various characters and events from the Lord of the Rings trilogy. 

In August 2026, Wizards will release a second Tolkien-related Magic: The Gathering Universes Beyond product, [[Magic: The Gathering - The Hobbit|Magic: The Gathering | The Hobbit]].
